ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds - The Illyrian Enigma
ComicInfo.Summary: The Illyrian Enigma [Part 3]: Captain Pike leads the Enterprise to the Illyrian home world, where the Illyrians who have kidnapped Spock have transformed his body to survive the harsh surface conditions and sent him to investigate an ancient Vulcan artifact on the planet. Once on the planet, Spock finds himself transported to the ancient past where he is part of an unrecorded Vulcan visit to Illyria.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 07:13:11. [CVDB973501] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:45:05. [Issue ID 2497066]
ComicInfo.Characters: Lt. Spock [also as Skalan],Telkun,Captain Christopher Pike,Cadet Nyota Uhura,Governor Da-Kil,unnamed Illyrians,unnamed Vulcan,Lt. Erica Ortegas,Lt. Jenna Mitchell
ComicInfo.Title: The Illyrian Enigma [Part 3]
